title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 520.9 - Copies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 520.9 - Copies

State Regulations
(a) Prepare enough
copies of all correspondence and forms to provide one for the offender, plus
one for each level of command that handles the action. The unit JA shall retain
a record of the action in his file. (b) The commander must furnish the required
number of copies to the unit JA for processing under section
520.10
(a) of this Part. (c) Each copy must be
signed and dated, or be reproduced from the signed original. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
520.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
